name: The Green hero
description:
Instructions:

Touchscreen to mobiles.

To move: A/D or Arrow keys.

To jump: space or UP (arrow key)

To punch: Z

You can defeat enemies by jumping on them.

Or with punch/apple attack.

Jumping is easier.

***********************************************

Hey, guys!

This is my first game.

I created it for my 3-year-old son to play.

I'm still working on it (studying Pixel art and Construct2).

I spent 4 months developing it in my spare time. Tell me what you think!

For now there are 6 levels available.

There is still a lot to do, but I am updating frequently.

I hope you like it.

I accept Feedbacks.

Suggestions for titles, maybe?

Credits:
